languages.text: Когда служители Омниссии объединили части древнего механизма, внутри корпуса раздались тихие щелчки, и шестерни пришли в движение. Металлические пластины раздвинулись, высвободив из глубин позолоченные лучи археотечного компаса. Между лучей сияет голопроекция: модель звездной системы Мю-Ро 79. Один из миров помечен неизвестным символом.

When the servants of the Omnissiah assembled the parts of this ancient mechanism, quiet clicks sounded from within and the cogs stirred into motion. The metal plates of the archeotech compass parted, releasing a cascade of golden rays. A hololithic projection shines between the rays: a model of the star system Mu-Rho 79. One of its worlds is marked with an unknown symbol.
languages.original_text: Когда служители Омниссии объединили части древнего механизма, внутри корпуса раздались тихие щелчки, и шестерни пришли в движение. Металлические пластины раздвинулись, высвободив из глубин позолоченные лучи археотечного компаса. Между лучей сияет голопроекция: модель звездной системы Мю-Ро 79. Один из миров помечен неизвестным символом.

traits.locale_text: When the servants of the Omnissiah assembled the parts of this ancient mechanism, quiet clicks sounded from within and the cogs stirred into motion. The metal plates of the archeotech compass parted, releasing a cascade of golden rays. A hololithic projection shines between the rays: a model of the star system Mu-Rho 79. One of its worlds is marked with an unknown symbol.

The metal plates of the archeotech compass parted, releasing a cascade of golden rays. A hololithic projection shines between the rays: a model of the star system Mu-Rho 79. One of its worlds is marked with an unknown symbol.

When the servants of the Omnissiah assembled the parts of this ancient mechanism, quiet clicks sounded from within and the cogs stirred into motion. The metal plates of the archeotech compass parted, releasing a cascade of golden rays. A hololithic projection shines between the rays: a model of the star system Mu-Rho 79. One of its worlds is marked with an unknown symbol.

When the servants of the Omnissiah assembled the parts of this ancient mechanism, quiet clicks sounded from within and the cogs stirred into motion. The metal plates of the archeotech compass parted, releasing a cascade of golden rays. A hololithic projection shines between the rays: a model of the star system Mu-Rho 79. One of its worlds is marked with an unknown symbol.

languages.text: Als die Diener des Omnissiah die Teile dieses uralten Mechanismus zusammengesetzt hatten, ertönte von innen ein leises Klicken und die Zahnräder setzten sich in Bewegung. Die Metallplatten des Archäotech-Kompasses öffneten sich und setzten eine Kaskade goldener Strahlen frei. Zwischen den Strahlen leuchtete eine hololithische Projektion auf: ein Modell des Sternensystems Mu-Rho 79. Eine seiner Welten war mit einem unbekannten Symbol versehen.
languages.original_text: When the servants of the Omnissiah assembled the parts of this ancient mechanism, quiet clicks sounded from within and the cogs stirred into motion. The metal plates of the archeotech compass parted, releasing a cascade of golden rays. A hololithic projection shines between the rays: a model of the star system Mu-Rho 79. One of its worlds is marked with an unknown symbol.

traits.locale_text: Als die Diener des Omnissiah die Teile dieses uralten Mechanismus zusammengesetzt hatten, ertönte von innen ein leises Klicken und die Zahnräder setzten sich in Bewegung. Die Metallplatten des Archäotech-Kompasses öffneten sich und setzten eine Kaskade goldener Strahlen frei. Zwischen den Strahlen leuchtete eine hololithische Projektion auf: ein Modell des Sternensystems Mu-Rho 79. Eine seiner Welten war mit einem unbekannten Symbol versehen.

languages.text: Lorsque les serviteurs de l'Omnimessie assemblèrent les pièces de cet ancien mécanisme, des cliquetis sourds émergèrent de ses entrailles et ses rouages s'enclenchèrent. Les plaques métalliques de la boussole archéotechnologique se séparèrent, libérant un flot de rayons dorés entre lesquels une projection hololithique du système stellaire Mu-Rho 79 apparut. L'un de ses mondes est marqué d'un symbole inconnu.
languages.original_text: When the servants of the Omnissiah assembled the parts of this ancient mechanism, quiet clicks sounded from within and the cogs stirred into motion. The metal plates of the archeotech compass parted, releasing a cascade of golden rays. A hololithic projection shines between the rays: a model of the star system Mu-Rho 79. One of its worlds is marked with an unknown symbol.

traits.locale_text: Lorsque les serviteurs de l'Omnimessie assemblèrent les pièces de cet ancien mécanisme, des cliquetis sourds émergèrent de ses entrailles et ses rouages s'enclenchèrent. Les plaques métalliques de la boussole archéotechnologique se séparèrent, libérant un flot de rayons dorés entre lesquels une projection hololithique du système stellaire Mu-Rho 79 apparut. L'un de ses mondes est marqué d'un symbole inconnu.

languages.text: 欧姆尼塞亚的仆人组装起了这台古老机械的部件，机械内部传来了安静的咔哒声，齿轮也开始转动。远古科技的金属板打开，散发出金色的光芒，明亮的光线构成了全息投影——那是恒星系统“穆罗霍79号”的全息模型，其中某个世界上画着一个未知的符号。
languages.original_text: When the servants of the Omnissiah assembled the parts of this ancient mechanism, quiet clicks sounded from within and the cogs stirred into motion. The metal plates of the archeotech compass parted, releasing a cascade of golden rays. A hololithic projection shines between the rays: a model of the star system Mu-Rho 79. One of its worlds is marked with an unknown symbol.

traits.locale_text: 欧姆尼塞亚的仆人组装起了这台古老机械的部件，机械内部传来了安静的咔哒声，齿轮也开始转动。远古科技的金属板打开，散发出金色的光芒，明亮的光线构成了全息投影——那是恒星系统“穆罗霍79号”的全息模型，其中某个世界上画着一个未知的符号。

languages.text: Cuando los sirvientes del Omnissiah ensamblaron las piezas de este antiguo mecanismo, unos ligeros chasquidos sonaron en su interior y los engranajes empezaron a girar. Las placas metálicas de la brújula de arqueotecnología se separaron, revelando una cascada de rayos dorados. Una proyección hololítica surge de entre los rayos: es una representación del sistema Mu-Ro 79, en la que uno de los planetas está marcado con un símbolo que no reconoces.
languages.original_text: When the servants of the Omnissiah assembled the parts of this ancient mechanism, quiet clicks sounded from within and the cogs stirred into motion. The metal plates of the archeotech compass parted, releasing a cascade of golden rays. A hololithic projection shines between the rays: a model of the star system Mu-Rho 79. One of its worlds is marked with an unknown symbol.

traits.locale_text: Cuando los sirvientes del Omnissiah ensamblaron las piezas de este antiguo mecanismo, unos ligeros chasquidos sonaron en su interior y los engranajes empezaron a girar. Las placas metálicas de la brújula de arqueotecnología se separaron, revelando una cascada de rayos dorados. Una proyección hololítica surge de entre los rayos: es una representación del sistema Mu-Rho 79, en la que uno de los planetas está marcado con un símbolo que no reconoces.

languages.text: 万機神の従者達がこの古代の機械の部品を組み立てると、内側から静かにカチッと音がして、歯車が動き出した。アーケオテック・コンパスの金属板が開き、黄金の光線が滝のように放たれる。光線の間にホロリシックの投影が輝いた。ムー・ロー79星系のモデルだ。その惑星のひとつには、謎のシンボルが記されている。
languages.original_text: When the servants of the Omnissiah assembled the parts of this ancient mechanism, quiet clicks sounded from within and the cogs stirred into motion. The metal plates of the archeotech compass parted, releasing a cascade of golden rays. A hololithic projection shines between the rays: a model of the star system Mu-Rho 79. One of its worlds is marked with an unknown symbol.

traits.locale_text: 万機神の従者達がこの古代の機械の部品を組み立てると、内側から静かにカチッと音がして、歯車が動き出した。アーケオテック・コンパスの金属板が開き、黄金の光線が滝のように放たれる。光線の間にホロリシックの投影が輝いた。ムー・ロー79星系のモデルだ。その惑星のひとつには、謎のシンボルが記されている。

languages.text: Hermesih'in hizmetkârları, bu kadim mekanizmanın parçalarını birleştirdiğinde içinden sessiz tıkırtılar duyuldu ve dişliler harekete geçti. Arkeotek pusulanın metal plakaları altın ışınlardan bir çağlayan gibi ışıl ışıl. Işınlar arasında hololitik bir projeksiyon parıldıyor. Mu-Ro 79 adlı yıldız sisteminin bir modeli bu. Dünyalardan biri, bilinmeyen bir sembolle işaretlenmiş.
languages.original_text: When the servants of the Omnissiah assembled the parts of this ancient mechanism, quiet clicks sounded from within and the cogs stirred into motion. The metal plates of the archeotech compass parted, releasing a cascade of golden rays. A hololithic projection shines between the rays: a model of the star system Mu-Rho 79. One of its worlds is marked with an unknown symbol.
